DataElement.preferredName: Person Specimen Use Consent Eligibility Determination Indicator
DataElement.preferredDefinition: the indicator related to the consent or permission of a person to use a preparation of tissue or bodily fluid taken for examination or diagnosis as an act of determining if a subject is suitable for enrollment in a study according specific protocol criteria and procedures.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Person Specimen Use Consent Eligibility Determination
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: information related to the consent or permission of a person to use a preparation of tissue or bodily fluid taken for examination or diagnosis as an act of determining if a subject is suitable for enrollment in a study according specific protocol criteria and procedures.

Property.preferredDefinition: A part of a thing, or of several things, taken to demonstrate or to determine the character of the whole, e.g. a substance, or portion of material obtained for use in testing, examination, or study; particularly, a preparation of tissue or bodily fluid taken for examination or diagnosis.:Use; put into service; make work or employ (something) for a particular purpose or for its inherent or natural purpose.:Permission to do something.:Criteria to determine eligibility of patients for medical care programs and services.

Concepts.definition: A part of a thing, or of several things, taken to demonstrate or to determine the character of the whole, e.g. a substance, or portion of material obtained for use in testing, examination, or study; particularly, a preparation of tissue or bodily fluid taken for examination or diagnosis.
A manner, or usual, or accepted practice of using something.
The act of determining if a subject is suitable for enrollment in a study according specific protocol criteria and procedures.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: trial-specific criteria that a patient must meet to be enrolled.

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: the indicator related to eligibility determinations.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: Not known, not observed, not recorded, or refused.

Concepts.definition: Not known, observed, recorded; or reported as unknown by the data contributor.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: Information regarding the subject is unknown or inaccessible at this time.

Concepts.definition: Information regarding the subject is unknown or inaccessible at this time.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The non-affirmative response to a question.: Systematic, objective appraisal of the significance, effectiveness, and impact of activities or condition according to specified objectives and criteria.

Concepts.definition: The non-affirmative response to a question.
Systematic, objective appraisal of the significance, effectiveness, and impact of activities or condition according to specified objectives and criteria.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The affirmative response to a question.

Concepts.definition: The affirmative response to a question.

ValueMeaning.administrativeNotes: 2022.12.29 Alt VM added per ticket request CADSR0001837. ak

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The non-affirmative response to a question.

Concepts.definition: The non-affirmative response to a question.

ValueMeaning.changeDescription: Updated to add NCIt concept relationship. Updated VM Short Name to be the Public ID to be consistent with current convention for VM Short Name - DW 10-03-2022
ValueMeaning.administrativeNotes: 2022.12.29 Alt VM added per ticket request CADSR0001837. ak

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: Determination that a value is not relevant in the current context.

Concepts.definition: Determination of a value is not relevant in the current context.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: trial-specific criteria that a patient must meet to be enrolled.

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: An event, entity or condition that typically characterizes a prescribed environment or situation. Indicators determine or aid in determining whether or not certain stated circumstances exist or criteria are satisfied. (On-line Medical Dictionary)

Concepts.definition: An event, entity or condition that typically characterizes a prescribed environment or situation and determines or aids in determining whether certain stated circumstances exist or criteria are satisfied.

ReferenceDocuments.name: Patient willing to provide ti
ReferenceDocuments.description: Patient willing to provide tissue and blood samples for research purposes

ReferenceDocuments.name: CRF Text2
ReferenceDocuments.description: Must be willing to provide blood and tissue samples for eligibility and research purposes, as described in Sections 14.0 and 17.0

ReferenceDocuments.name: CRF Text3
ReferenceDocuments.description:
Phase I established MTD patients (Section 7.27, second paragraph) and Phase II patients: Willing to provide mandatory tissue samples (slides or blocks) for research purposes (see Sections 6.36 and 17.4).
If not a Phase I established MTD or Phase II patient (check NA)
